column1: #FORMAT=WebAnno TSV 3.3
#T_SP=webanno.custom.DemoNERRE|NamedentityTags
#T_RL=webanno.custom.DemoRE|NamedentityRelations|BT_webanno.custom.DemoNERRE
#Text=The single crystals of LiMn6Sn6 were grown by the self-
#Text=ﬂux method.
#Text=Li, Mn, and Sn with atomic ratio of Li : Mn : Sn
#Text== 3 : 3 : 10 were loaded in a Ta crucible, and a Ta ﬁlter with
#Text=drilled holes was then knocked into the crucible.
#Text=The crucible
#Text=was ﬁnally arc welded with a Ta cap and sealed in an evac-
#Text=uated quartz tube.
#Text=The tube was heated to 1000 ◦C, kept for
#Text=20 hs, and then cooled down to 500 ◦C with a rate of 3 ◦C/h.
#Text=After that, the tube was centrifuged to separate the crys-
#Text=tals from ﬂux.
#Text=Hexagonal plate-shaped single crystals were
#Text=obtained without signiﬁcant air sensitivity.
#Text=The crystal struc-
#Text=ture of the samples was checked by x-ray diffraction (XRD)
#Text=on a PANalytical diffractometer with Cu Kα radiation at
#Text=room temperature.
#Text=The hexagonal plate-shaped crystals were
#Text=used for the magnetic properties measurements, and were
#Text=cut into sticks before the electrical transport measurements.
#Text=The magnetic properties and electrical transport properties
#Text=were measured on a Quantum Design Magnetic Properties
#Text=Measurement System and a Physical Properties Measurement
#Text=System, respectively.
